instructions_html:
<div class="alert alert-info" role="alert">For each example, click on the individual words to indicate all words which indicate the eye color of the <em>subject of the example.  Please 
Pick the eye color

For each sentence below do one of the following:
  • If the sentence contains text that describes the eye color of the subject(s) of the sentence, highlight the text and map it to corresponding category by clicking on the "Eye Color" box below.
  • Each mention of eye color in a sentence is differentiated by a different highlight color.
  • User can delete/modify a created tag.
  • If a sentence does not contain any enity, check " No entity found in sentence".
description: Find mentions of eye color in text
title: Find eye color
keywords: classification, annotation, categorization, markup, natural language, identification
